post.text: Vice President Joe Biden's hitting the trail with Hillary in his hometown. Watch their first joint rally of this campaign live from Scranton, PA.

comment.author: Rachel
comment.text: THANK GOD YOU HAVE TELEPROMPTERS. I DON'T KNOW HOW YOU WOULD KNOW WHAT TO SAY, OR WHAT EMOTION AND WHAT TIME TO SHOW..!!! ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚
